org.dejava.component.util.i18n.source.annotation

Annotation Type MessageSource


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=ANNOTATION_TYPE)
public @interface MessageSource
    Defines a source of messages.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String bundleBaseName
      Base name of the bundle that the class provides messages to.
      java.lang.String[] processors
      Full qualified names of the processors classes.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String[] availableLocales
      Available locales that this source must provide messages to.
      java.lang.String description
      Description for the message source file.
      java.lang.String sourcePath
      The source path where the source files should be created.

    • Element Detail

      • bundleBaseName

        public abstract java.lang.String bundleBaseName
        Base name of the bundle that the class provides messages to.

      • processors

        public abstract java.lang.String[] processors
        Full qualified names of the processors classes.

      • sourcePath

        public abstract java.lang.String sourcePath
        The source path where the source files should be created. "src" is used by default.
        Default:
        "src"

      • description

        public abstract java.lang.String description
        Description for the message source file.
        Default:
        ""

      • availableLocales

        public abstract java.lang.String[] availableLocales
        Available locales that this source must provide messages to. By default, "en_US" and "pt_BR" are used.
        Default:
        {"en_US", "pt_BR"}
